title: New Nintendo Switch $100 More? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.23.21
description:
Download the DoorDash app in the App Store and use code GAMES2021 or
GAMESCA (if you’re in Canada) to get 25% off and free delivery on your first order!

Go to http://gabi.com/gamesdaily to find out how much Gabi can save you!

Gary and Greg talk about the new Switch rumors, Xbox Live dying, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:00 - Housekeeping
SnyderCut In Review is done and there’s a new KF Podcast on youtube.com/kindafunny
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mick @DaNanoBiologist Abrahamson, Black Jack, & Trent Berrie, & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:09:20 - More Switch Pro Rumors, Takashi Mochizuki and Ian King @ Bloomberg
00:19:45 - Microsoft in Talks to Buy Discord, Dina Bass and Katie Roof @ Bloomberg
00:31:30 - Xbox Live is Dead, Long Live Xbox Network, Tom Warren at the Verge
00:34:50 -DrinkBox Reveal at Friday’s ID@Xbox Showcase, Eddie @ GameSpot
00:37:30 -  Ad
00:41:15 - Monster Hunter Rise Review Round-Up
00:45:49 - Niantic and Nintendo working on a Pikmin App,  Niantic
00:49:50 - Studio Openings and Acquisitions!
00:53:00 - Out today
01:01:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing and Janet

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Blessing - http://www.twitter.com/BlessingJr
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
